maybe you got a particular program making it not so simple, but for the most part it is that simple.
Assuming you have a standard wine install, in a terminal type: cp ~/Desktop/*.dll  ~/.wine/drive_c/windows/system32
can you open a folder window to ~/.wine/drive_c/windows/system32  and then open a folder window to ~/Desktop?
and if you can do that, can you drag and drop the files you want to copy?
and if you can;t do that, do you get an error message?
in a terminal type: "nautilus ~/Desktop;  nautilus ~/.wine/drive_c/windows/system32"  without quotes and 2 windows should pop up.
